translation.en: What... what do you want? What... what is the truth?
-Can you be honest for once? -[echo] Once... once...
translation.es: - Sé sincero por una vez. - ¿Por qué mientes sobre tus padres?

translation.en: [reporter] Why are you lying about your parents, Freddie?
translation.es: - Sé sincero por una vez. - ¿Por qué mientes sobre tus padres? - No miento sobre nada. Solo... - Tus fans merecen la verdad.

translation.en: I'm... I'm not lying about anything. I just, I'm... [reporter 2] Your fans deserve to know the truth, Freddie.
translation.es: - No miento sobre nada. Solo... - Tus fans merecen la verdad.

translation.en: Can you answer the question, please?
This is my business. It's my business. [reporter] No, you're a public figure.
translation.es: - Es asunto mío. - Eres una figura pública.

translation.en: What are you afraid of, Freddie?
translation.es: - ¿A qué le temes? - Tus padres. - Habla de... - Tu sexualidad.

translation.en: -[reporter] Your parents? -[critic] Can you tell us about your sexuality?
-What? Why, why... -Can you just be honest?
[reporter 3] Our readers want to know. What do your readers want to know? They want to know what?
translation.es: - Nuestros lectores quieren saber. - ¿Qué quieren saber?

translation.en: [Roger] Brilliant! Can I get up now? What is happening?
-[John] No, you can't. -[laughter]
-[Brian] I wanna be in it. -[John] Get off me!
Freddie, you in there?
-[knocking] -Freddie?
They're here.
We can't put this off any longer.
Freddie?
[Freddie] MTV banned our video.
The youth of America. We helped give birth to MTV.
translation.es: La juventud de Estados Unidos. Nosotros le dimos vida a MTV.

translation.en: [Brian] It's America. They're Puritans in public, perverts in private.
translation.es: Es EUA. Son puritanos en público, pervertidos en privado.

translation.en: I'm never touring in the US again.
translation.es: Jamás haré otra gira en EUA.

translation.en: [chuckles dryly] And I'm the one being blamed for it.
translation.es: Y a mí me culpan por todo.

translation.en: Not you, dear...
translation.es: A ti no, tesoro, quien tuvo la idea de vestirnos de mujeres.

translation.en: whose idea, I believe, it was to dress up in drag. And not you.
translation.es: A ti no, tesoro, quien tuvo la idea de vestirnos de mujeres. Y a ti no. Ni siquiera a ti, quien compuso la canción.

translation.en: Not even you, who wrote the bloody thing.
translation.es: Y a ti no. Ni siquiera a ti, quien compuso la canción.

translation.en: Crazy, cross-dressing Freddie.
Freddie the freak. Freddie the fag.
translation.es: Freddie el fenómeno. Freddie el marica.

translation.en: I'm tired of touring. Aren't you?
translation.es: Estoy cansado de las giras. ¿Ustedes no?

translation.en: Album, tour, album, tour.
translation.es: Estoy cansado de las giras. ¿Ustedes no? Álbum, gira, álbum.

translation.en: I want to do something different. We're a band. That's what bands do.
translation.es: - Quiero hacer algo diferente. - Somos una banda. Eso hacemos.

translation.en: -Album, tour, album, tour. -Well, I need a break.
translation.es: - Álbum, gira, álbum... - Necesito una pausa.

translation.en: -I'm sick of it. -What are you saying, Freddie?
I've signed a deal with CBS Records.
translation.es: Firmé un contrato con CBS Records.

translation.en: -[Roger] You've done what? -Without telling us?
What kind of deal?
translation.es: - ¿Qué contrato? - No digo que no volveremos

translation.en: Look, I'm not saying we won't record or ever tour again.
translation.es: - ¿Qué contrato? - No digo que no volveremos a grabar o a hacer giras. Queen continuará.

translation.en: Queen will go on.
translation.es: a grabar o a hacer giras. Queen continuará.

translation.en: But I need to do something different.
translation.es: Pero necesito hacer algo diferente. ¿Me entienden?

translation.en: Do you know what I mean? I need-- I need to grow.
translation.es: Pero necesito hacer algo diferente. ¿Me entienden? Necesito crecer.

translation.en: What... what... what's the song? "Fly Away"?
-"Spread my wings and fly away." -"Spread my wings and fly away."
A solo album?
[Paul] Two, actually.
-Back to back. -Another word out of you, and I'll throw you out the bloody window.
translation.es: - Uno tras otro. - Cállate o te tiro por la ventana.

translation.en: But that's years, Freddie. I mean...
-that'll take years. -Ye of little faith.
translation.es: - Te llevará años. - Ten algo de fe.

translation.en: I don't believe this.
How much?
What did they pay you?
-I wanna know how much they paid you-- -$4 million!
That's more than any Queen deal. Look, the routine is killing us.
translation.es: - Más de lo que gana Queen. - Esta rutina está matándonos.

translation.en: I mean, you must all want a break from all the arguments.
translation.es: Sé que quieren descansar de las discusiones.

translation.en: I mean, whose song gets on the album,
whose song's the single, who wrote what...
translation.es: cuál será el sencillo, quién compuso qué,

translation.en: who gets a bigger slice of the royalties, what's on the B-side, all of it.
translation.es: quién gana más regalías, qué hay en el lado B. Todo.

translation.en: -You must need a break. -Freddie, we're a family.
translation.es: Deben querer una pausa. - Freddie, somos una familia. - ¡No lo somos!

translation.en: No, we're not! We're not a family!
translation.es: - Freddie, somos una familia. - ¡No lo somos! ¡No somos una familia! Ustedes tienen familias. Hijos, esposas.

translation.en: You've got families, children, wives.
translation.es: ¡No somos una familia! Ustedes tienen familias. Hijos, esposas.

translation.en: What have I got?
You've got $4 million. Perhaps you can buy yourself a family.
translation.es: Cuatro millones. Quizá puedas comprarte una familia.

translation.en: [Freddie] I won't compromise my vision any longer.
translation.es: No voy a seguir limitando mi visión.

translation.en: -[sighs] -[Roger] Compromise?
Are you joking?
You were working at Heathrow before we gave you a chance.
translation.es: ¡Eras maletero antes de darte una oportunidad!

translation.en: And without me... you-- you'd be a dentist...
translation.es: Y de no ser por mí, tú serías un dentista

translation.en: drumming 12/8-time blues at the weekend at the Crown and Anchor.
translation.es: que toca blues en su batería en una taberna los fines de semana.

translation.en: And you. Well, you would be Dr. Brian May...
translation.es: Y tú. Serías el Dr. Brian May,

translation.en: author of a fascinating dissertation on the cosmos that no one ever reads.
translation.es: autor de una fascinante tesis sobre el cosmos que nadie leería nunca.

translation.en: And Deacy...
for the life of me... nothing comes to mind.
translation.es: por más que me esfuerzo, nada me viene a la mente.

translation.en: I studied electrical engineering.
translation.es: Estudié Ingeniería Eléctrica. ¿Cumple con tus estándares?

translation.en: -Does that meet your standard? -It's perfect.
translation.es: Estudié Ingeniería Eléctrica. ¿Cumple con tus estándares? Es perfecto.

translation.en: You just killed Queen.
Oh, give it a kiss one day. She might wake up.
translation.es: Dale un beso un día. Tal vez despierte.

translation.en: You need us, Freddie.
-More than you know. -I don't need anyone.
translation.es: - Más de lo que crees. - No necesito a nadie.

translation.en: -[Freddie playing piano] -[Paul] Hello?
-Paul. Can I speak to Freddie? -Oh, Mary. No, he can't talk right now.
translation.es: Paul, ¿puedo hablar con Freddie? Mary. No puede hablar en este momento.

translation.en: He's working day and night, constantly.
translation.es: Trabaja día y noche, sin descanso.

translation.en: Will you make sure to tell him that I called?
Don't worry, he's in safe hands.
translation.es: No te preocupes. Está en buenas manos.

translation.en: I will certainly tell him you called.
translation.es: Por supuesto le diré que llamaste.

translation.en: -Freddie, it's really great. -[music stops]
It's shit!
Just leave it. [Paul] Yeah, hang on one second.
-[Freddie singing on recording] -Give it more treble.
[Beach] Where is he? Is he there? I wanna speak to him.
He is working himself to the bone.
I'm blue in the face trying to get him to take a break.
translation.es: Hago lo imposible para que descanse.

translation.en: [Beach] Paul, listen to me. It's one performance for a good cause.
translation.es: Paul, es una presentación para una buena causa.

translation.en: It's a televised concert for the famine in Ethiopia.
translation.es: Un concierto televisado por la hambruna en Etiopía.

translation.en: They're gonna have simultaneous performances in Philadelphia and London.
translation.es: Presentaciones simultáneas en Filadelfia y Londres.

translation.en: There's gonna be a billion people watching. Queen should be part of it.
translation.es: Mil millones de espectadores. Queen debe estar ahí.

translation.en: [Paul] He's just been really focused, but I'll be sure to pass it on.
translation.es: Ha estado muy concentrado, pero le daré el mensaje.

translation.en: Sure you will.
Hi.
[Freddie] Hi. Come in, come in.
Why did you come all this way?
I just haven't heard from you in so long, and I phoned and phoned, and then...
translation.es: Hace mucho que no sé nada de ti y llamé y llamé y luego...

translation.en: last night I just had this terrible dream that something bad had happened...
translation.es: anoche tuve un sueño horrible, que algo malo había pasado.

translation.en: [Freddie] No, no. I've been working, that's all.
translation.es: No, no. He estado trabajando, es todo.

translation.en: Freddie, you're burning the candle at both ends.
translation.es: Freddie, creo que te estás excediendo.

translation.en: Yes, but the glow is so divine.
translation.es: Sí, pero el resultado será divino.

translation.en: Being human is a condition that requires a little anesthesia.
translation.es: Ser humano es un estado que requiere de algo de anestesia.

translation.en: -I miss you. -I miss you. I miss you so much.
translation.es: - Te extraño. - Yo también. Te extraño mucho.

translation.en: Listen, but I have to finish the second album.
translation.es: Pero debo terminar el segundo álbum.

translation.en: I need you.
Stay. Stay here with me. Just you and me.
translation.es: Quédate. Quédate conmigo. Tú y yo nada más.

translation.en: I need the love of my life.
translation.es: Necesito al amor de mi vida.

translation.en: Freddie... What about Queen?
Jim told me he's been trying to contact you about Live Aid,
translation.es: Jim te ha estado buscando por lo de Live Aid

translation.en: and you won't take his calls.
What is Live Aid?
You haven't heard?
Freddie, it's the biggest concert there's ever been or ever will be.
translation.es: Freddie, es el concierto más grande de la historia.

translation.en: It's for the famine in Africa.
translation.es: Es por la hambruna en África.

translation.en: Well, perhaps Paul thought it wasn't a good idea.
translation.es: Es por la hambruna en África. Quizá Paul creyó que era una mala idea.

translation.en: A distraction from my work. That's what's important, that I finish this album.
translation.es: Una distracción. Lo importante es que termine este álbum.

translation.en: -Stay with me, darling, and I'll be all right. -Freddie, I can't stay with you.
translation.es: Quédate conmigo, mi vida, y estaré bien. No puedo quedarme.

translation.en: -Of course you can. I need you, Mary. -Freddie, I'm pregnant.
translation.es: Claro que sí. Te necesito, Mary. Freddie, estoy embarazada.

translation.en: How could you?
How could I?
-Freddie, this has nothing to do with you. -[Paul] Come on. Let's get in.
translation.es: Freddie, esto no tiene nada que ver contigo. Vengan. Pasen.

translation.en: -I bought some nibbles. -[door opens]
-Sorry we're late. -[men laughing]
What a pleasant surprise.
Hans. Everyone, come in. Milan, make our guests comfortable.
translation.es: Hans. Todos, adelante. Milan, atiende a nuestros invitados.

translation.en: I wish I knew you were coming to stay.
translation.es: Ojalá hubiera sabido que te quedarías.

translation.en: I'd have scrubbed the place.
-Actually, I'm not staying. -Wait. Mary, wait. Don't go.
translation.es: De hecho, no me quedaré. Espera. Mary, espera. No te vayas.

translation.en: You told me you had a dream.
translation.es: Me dijiste que tuviste un sueño.

translation.en: What was it?
I was trying to talk to you...
...but it was like talking to my father.
translation.es: era como hablar con mi padre.

translation.en: You needed to tell me something...
but you couldn't say it.
Because you had no voice.
[Paul] Freddie, come and say hello to our new guests.
translation.es: Freddie, ven a saludar a nuestros invitados.

translation.en: -They're dying to meet you. -[sniffs]
-[door opens] -He'll be one second.
[Freddie] Mary!
I'm happy for you, Mary.
Truly, I am.
It's just...
-I'm frightened. -Freddie, you don't need to be.
translation.es: Tengo miedo. Freddie, no tienes por qué.

translation.en: Because no matter what, you are loved.
translation.es: Porque pase lo que pase, eres amado.

translation.en: By me, by Brian, Deacy, Roger... your family.
translation.es: Por mí, por Brian, Deacy, Roger... tu familia.

translation.en: It's enough.
And these people... they don't care about you.
translation.es: Y a estas personas... no les importas.

translation.en: Paul doesn't care about you.
You don't belong here, Freddie.
translation.es: Este no es tu lugar, Freddie.

translation.en: Come home.
Home.
Freddie!
What are you doing? You'll catch your death.
Why didn't you tell me about Live Aid?
translation.es: ¿Por qué no me dijiste lo de Live Aid?

translation.en: The Africa charity gig?
It'll be an embarrassment. I didn't wanna waste your time.
translation.es: Será una vergüenza. No quería que perdieras el tiempo.

translation.en: -You should have told me. -Of course I did.
translation.es: Debiste decirme. Claro que lo hice.

translation.en: You forgot.
You're always forgetting things.
Come in now and have a drink.
-You're out. -[Paul] What do you mean?
I want you out of my life.
translation.es: No te quiero en mi vida.

translation.en: 'Cause I'm the only one left, you're blaming me for everything?
translation.es: ¿Por ser el único que queda, me culpas a mí por todo?

translation.en: I blame myself.
So I'm out? Just like that?
After everything we've been through?
translation.es: ¿Después de todo lo que hemos pasado?

translation.en: Just think of the photos I have.
translation.es: Solo piensa en las fotos que tengo.

translation.en: I know who you are, Freddie Mercury.
[Freddie] You know when you know you've gone rotten?
translation.es: ¿Sabes cómo darte cuenta de que te pudriste?

translation.en: Really rotten?
Fruit flies.
Dirty little fruit flies.
Coming to feast on what's left.
translation.es: Que llegan a devorar lo que queda.

translation.en: Well, there isn't much left for you to feast on anymore.
translation.es: Pero ya no queda mucho aquí que tú puedas devorar.

translation.en: -["Under Pressure" plays] -So, fly off.
Do what you like with your photographs and your stories.
translation.es: Haz lo que quieras con tus fotografías y tus historias.

translation.en: But promise me one thing:
That I never see your face again.
translation.es: Que jamás volveré a ver tu cara.

translation.en: Ever.
I didn't mean it.
-I'm sorry! Freddie, come back! -♪ Pushing down on me ♪
-♪ Pressin' down on you ♪ -I'll make it better.
♪ No man ask for ♪
[Paul] But, Peter, you might be right. I'm not even hurt
by the fact that he's let me go as a friend.
translation.es: No me duele el que me retirara su amistad.

translation.en: But you can only be there so much for a person.
translation.es: Pero el apoyo tiene un límite.

translation.en: [journalist] And so, Mr. Prenter...
all these stories about Freddie Mercury and his lovers...
translation.es: todas esas historias sobre Freddie Mercury y sus amantes...

translation.en: -that there were so many. -[Paul] Yeah?
[journalist] Is it really true? [Paul] Yes, it is. His lovers were countless.
translation.es: - ¿Es verdad? - Sí. Sus amantes eran incontables.

translation.en: Genuinely countless. Uh...
All these wild, drug-fueled parties
translation.es: Tantas fiestas salvajes llenas de droga,

translation.en: where he'd find another lover every night and...
translation.es: donde encontraba un nuevo amante cada noche

translation.en: and a routine he couldn't get out of.
translation.es: y una rutina de la que no podía escapar.

translation.en: [journalist] So, you really did see behind the mask?
I knew Freddie when he did "Bohemian Rhapsody." And the Freddie we have now...
translation.es: Conocí a Freddie cuando hizo Bohemian Rhapsody. El Freddie de ahora...

translation.en: he doesn't have the same passion about music.
translation.es: no tiene la misma pasión por la música.

translation.en: Hello?
-Hello? -Miami?
-Freddie? How are you? -There was this Africa concert...
translation.es: ¿Freddie? ¿Cómo estás? Hay un concierto a beneficio de África

translation.en: -that wants Queen to play. Is that still... -You mean Live Aid?
translation.es: en el que quieren a Queen. ¿Eso sigue...? ¿Hablas de Live Aid?

translation.en: They've announced all the bands, Freddie. It's too late.
translation.es: Ya anunciaron a todas las bandas, Freddie. Ya es tarde.

translation.en: I need... I need to reconnect with the mothership.
translation.es: Necesito... reconectar con la nave nodriza.

translation.en: Freddie, they don't want anything to do with you.
translation.es: Freddie, no quieren saber nada de ti.

translation.en: They're still very upset.
Maybe if-- if you ask them, they would meet me.
translation.es: Tal vez si tú se los pides, se reúnan conmigo.

translation.en: Tell them I want to talk.
Just talk.
We're family.
You know, family... have fights...
...all the time.
-I can call. -Thank you...
...Jim.
[journalist] As this friend, somebody who...
translation.es: - Jim. - Como su amigo, alguien que probablemente conoce a Freddie Mercury mejor que nadie.

translation.en: probably knows Freddie Mercury better than anybody else,
translation.es: alguien que probablemente conoce a Freddie Mercury mejor que nadie.

translation.en: how would you describe him inside as a person?
For me, Freddie will always be this frightened little Paki boy...
translation.es: Para mí, Freddie siempre será un pequeño paki asustado

translation.en: who's afraid to be alone.
translation.es: al que le da miedo estar solo.

translation.en: -["Under Pressure" resumes] -[journalist] I hope he sees this, and realizes
translation.es: Espero que vea esto y se dé cuenta de lo que se perdió.

translation.en: what he has lost in you.
translation.es: Espero que vea esto y se dé cuenta de lo que se perdió. Yo también.

translation.en: -[Paul] I hope he does, too. -[journalist] A close and important friend.
translation.es: Yo también. Un amigo importante y cercano.

translation.en: Where are they?
They're late.
-[Beach] Hi, guys. -[Brian] Jim.
[Beach] If anybody wants any tea, coffee,
bladed weapons, just-- just ask.
So...
-who wants to go first? -I'll start.
I've been hideous. I know that, and... I deserve your fury.
translation.es: Fui despreciable. Lo sé y... merezco su furia.

translation.en: I've been conceited...
selfish...
-Well, an asshole, basically. -Strong beginning.
translation.es: Un imbécil, básicamente. Un comienzo fuerte.

translation.en: Look, I'm happy to strip off my shirt
and flagellate myself before you.
Or rather, I could ask you a simple question.
translation.es: O podría hacerles una simple pregunta.

translation.en: I'm good with the flagellation.
translation.es: Me agrada lo de la flagelación.

translation.en: What's it gonna take for you all to forgive me?
translation.es: ¿Qué tengo que hacer para que me perdonen?

translation.en: Is that what you want, Freddie?
-I forgive you. Is that it? Can we go now? -No.
translation.es: Yo te perdono. - ¿Es todo? ¿Podemos irnos? - No.

translation.en: I went to Munich. I hired a bunch of guys.
translation.es: Me fui a Munich. Contraté a mucha gente.

translation.en: I told them exactly what I wanted them to do, and the problem was...
translation.es: Les dije exactamente qué quería que hicieran y el problema fue...

translation.en: ...they did it.
No pushback from Roger.
None of your rewrites. None of his funny looks.
translation.es: Ninguna de tus ediciones. Ninguna de sus miradas raras.

translation.en: I need you.
And you need me.
[pats] Let's face it. We're not bad for four aging queens.
translation.es: Aceptémoslo. No estamos mal para ser cuatro reinas con arrugas.

translation.en: So, um, go ahead. Name your terms.
translation.es: Así que, adelante. Díganme sus términos.

translation.en: Could you give us a moment please, Fred?
Why'd you do that?
-I just felt like it. -[chuckles]
They'll be all right. They just need a bit of time.
translation.es: No te preocupes. Solo necesitan tiempo.

translation.en: What if I don't have time?
What do you mean, Fred?
You can come back in now, if you'd like.
We decided...
-What did we decide? -From now on...
translation.es: ¿Qué decidimos? Desde ahora, cada canción, no importa quién la componga, música, letra...

translation.en: every song, no matter who wrote it, music, lyrics...
translation.es: Desde ahora, cada canción, no importa quién la componga, música, letra...

translation.en: it's by Queen.
Not one of us, just Queen.
translation.es: No de uno de nosotros, solo de Queen.

translation.en: All the money, all the credits, split four ways evenly.
translation.es: Todo el dinero, todo el crédito, se reparte en partes iguales.

translation.en: Done.
We have a problem with the people around you. Paul is out. I fired him.
translation.es: - Nos desagradan los que te rodean. - Despedí a Paul.

translation.en: -On what pretext? -Villainy.
-What else? -Bob Geldof.
I called to convince him to squeeze you guys into the lineup for the Live Aid concert,
translation.es: Lo convencí de que los incluyera en el concierto Live Aid,

translation.en: but he wants an answer now.
You have to make a decision.
Every ticket's already sold.
translation.es: Ya se vendieron todos los boletos.

translation.en: 100,000 people at Wembley... 100,000 people at JFK Stadium in Philadelphia...
translation.es: Cien mil personas en Wembley, cien mil en el estadio JFK en Filadelfia,

translation.en: a global TV audience around the world of 150 countries, 13 satellites.
translation.es: un público televisivo global en ciento cincuenta países, trece satélites.

translation.en: The Olympics only had three.
translation.es: En los Juegos Olímpicos solo había tres.

translation.en: We haven't played together in years.
translation.es: No hemos tocado juntos en años.

translation.en: It's kinda suicide to play again for the first time in front of millions.
translation.es: Es un suicidio volver a tocar por primera vez frente a millones.

translation.en: Try over 1.5 billion.
translation.es: Es un suicidio volver a tocar por primera vez frente a millones. Más de mil quinientos millones.

translation.en: [scoffs] "Who are these four dinosaurs?"
"Where's Madonna?"
It's a 20-minute set. Everyone gets the same.
translation.es: Son 20 minutos. Todos tendrán lo mismo.

translation.en: Jagger, Bowie...
Elton...
McCartney, The Who...
Led Zeppelin...
Phil Collins, REO Speedwagon...
Certainly good company.
[Beach] Anybody who is anybody is doing this concert.
translation.es: Todos los músicos importantes estarán ahí.

translation.en: Look. All I know...
translation.es: Todos los músicos importantes estarán ahí. Miren, yo solo sé

translation.en: is that if we wake up the day after this concert...
translation.es: que si despertamos al día siguiente del concierto

translation.en: and we didn't do our part...
we're going to regret it till the day we die.
translation.es: lo lamentaremos hasta el día de nuestra muerte.

translation.en: Please.
[news anchor] Every day, in San Francisco, two more men hear the grim news...
translation.es: Cada día en San Francisco, dos hombres más escuchan la devastadora noticia:

translation.en: "You have AIDS, there's no cure."
translation.es: Cada día en San Francisco, dos hombres más escuchan la devastadora noticia: "Tiene sida, no hay cura".

translation.en: Since doctors in France and America isolated the virus in 1983,
translation.es: Desde que médicos franceses y estadounidenses aislaron el virus en 1983,

translation.en: research has proceeded at a frantic pace.
translation.es: la investigación continúa a paso acelerado.

translation.en: The method used by the virus to destroy
translation.es: Ya se descubrió el método que utiliza el virus para destruir

translation.en: the body's immune system has been discovered...
translation.es: Ya se descubrió el método que utiliza el virus para destruir el sistema inmunológico,

translation.en: -♪ There's no time for us ♪ -...but a cure still seems many years away.
translation.es: el sistema inmunológico, pero la cura parece estar a años de encontrarse.

translation.en: -A major breakthrough has been a new blood test... -♪ There's no place for us ♪
translation.es: Un avance importante es una nueva prueba de sangre que asegurará que en el futuro nadie contraiga sida por una transfusión de sangre.

translation.en: ♪ What is this thing That builds our dreams ♪
